pkgmetadata.longdescription: Principal Component Analysis Applied to Ridit Scoring // Implements the 'PRIDIT' (Principal Component Analysis applied to 'RIDITs') scoring system described in Brockett et al. (2002) doi:10.1111/1539-6975.00027. Provides functions for ridit scoring originally developed by Bross (1958) doi:10.2307/2527727, calculating 'PRIDIT' weights, and computing final 'PRIDIT' scores for multivariate analysis of ordinal data.
